name: Sunavalon Dryatrentiay
text:
2+ Link Monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Sunavalon" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, also cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 Link Monster this card points to; destroy cards your opponent controls, up to the Tributed monster's Link Rating.
